Climbing the altar and worshiping the world, the golden list nominated proud of the group. 

When autumn comes on the eighth day of the ninth month, a hundred flowers will be killed after my flower blooms.

<size=60>Healthy advice</size> 
 Don't play bad games, and refuse pirated content.

 Spend your time wisely, and enjoy a healthy life.

UI_NewGame_Tip_CharactorLife_Content:
The average lifespan of the player and NPCs in-game. 
 <color=#E3C66DFF>(Lifespan does not affect game difficulty)</color> 
 <color=#E4504DFF>(This option cannot be changed once the game starts!)</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_BattleHard_Content:
Determines complexity of combat AI. Affects the level of strength and strategy of the enemies in battle. 
 <color=#E3C66DFF>(The higher the difficulty, the stronger the enemy will be; the more intelligent enemies are; the more actions they will perform in battle  
 For example: they will take better control of the distance and timing for attack and defence.)</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_RobberAmount_Content:
The number of enemies that exist in the world. How quickly their numbers increase. 
<color=#E3C66DFF>(encounter rate increases with higher difficulty)</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_AttackSpeed_Content:
Increases the invasion speed of the Taiwu Village. Quicker invasion speeds mean less preparation time, making it harder to defend the village. 
 <color=#E3C66DFF>(The game is over if the Taiwu Village is destroyed.)</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_WorldSituation_Content:
A prosperous world will benefit the development of Taiwu. 
 But even the most barren world can gradually recover. 
 <color=#E3C66DFF>(The world condition directly affects the recover speed of all kinds of resources in the world; The amount of resources gathered are likely to be different every time even in Wonderland world condition.)</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_RandomInherit_Content:
When the Player dies without selecting a successor, turning this 'On' will assign a random heir to ensure the Taiwu gets inherited. Otherwise there will be no heir. 
 <color=#E3C66DFF>(The game is over if no heir is assigned!)</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_BehaviorLimit: Choices made in events will be limited based on different standpoint restrictions, for a more realistic Taiwu world. (i.e., if you have chosen the Kind standpoint, you're limited to Just, Kind and Even choices)
UI_NewGame_Tip_WorldPopulation:
Controls the maximum limit of concurrent NPCs in the game. The more NPCs there are, the more diverse the World of Taiwu will be. 
 <color=#E3C66DFF>(Higher processing power is required for larger world population)</color> 
 <color=#E4504DFF>(This option cannot be changed once the game starts!)</color>

LK_Goodness_Desc_0:
For you as a just warrior there's only black or white, right or wrong. 
 The evil must be punished, and morality shall be encouraged, for there's only one way of being human!
LK_Goodness_Desc_1:
You are compassionate, benevolent, and behaves noble. 
Dedicating yourself to others, and repaying grievances with virtue. Your sense of morality is precious as gold and jade.
LK_Goodness_Desc_2:
You are moderate, unbiased, and mediocre. 
Everything goes with the flow, but prefers balance and harmony. You may finally tolerate everything in the world, for there is a lack of distinction between righteousness and evil in your heart.
LK_Goodness_Desc_3:
You are rebellious, straightforward, intolerant, and distort facts. 
Having opposite views and practices with most people.
LK_Goodness_Desc_4:
You are egoistic. Bullying the weakers, crusading the different ones, colluding with the villains, and deceiving kind people. 
Mercenary is ruthless, for profit is the only thing that matters.

Consume<color=#6DB75FFF>1</color>treatment chance to alleviate all external and internal injuries.  

 The more injuries you have, the longer it takes.

The more toxins you have, the longer it takes.
LK_Combat_EscapeInfo:
When the distance between enemy and you reaches<color=#6DB75FFF>10</color>you can try to escape from this battle.  

The escape will be interrupted if the distance between you and enemy reaches<color=#6DB75FFF>2</color> and they hit you!

LK_Combat_SurrenderInfo:
Concede defeat and surrender to the enemy and accept the result of defeat. 

 <color=#red> If you admit defeat and surrender in a deadly fight, you may die as a result </color>, and there is a difference between death and death, so you must not give up easily!

LK_Combat_PauseInfo: Click here（or press SPACE on keyboard）to pause or unpause the fight…
LK_Combat_Stance_Tips: Using external Martial Arts requires Stance. You can gain it by attacking your opponent with your weapon, and the amount you get depends on your Stance Gather stat...
LK_Combat_Breath_Tips: Using internal Martial Arts requires Inhale. Your character will recover it over time, and the recovery speed depends on your Inhale Gather stat...
LK_Combat_Mobility_Tips: Using Footwork arts requires Stamina The more Stamina is remaining, the faster your character moves...
LK_Combat_Skill_Mobility_Tips: After consuming Stamina to use Footwork art, you will gain Footwork's Stamina that gives special effects, and is consumed instead of Stamina when moving...
LK_Combat_Attack_Count_Tips: Performing weapon attacks requires attack tokens. Different weapons use different amount of attack tokens. The attack tokens recover on their own, and their recovery speed depends on Attack Speed stat...
LK_Combat_Trick_Tips: When you have the number of moves, double-click this "style" to consume the number of moves and perform a move change...
LK_Combat_Change_Trick_Tips:
When you attack an enemy with a weapon, the weapon that can do a style change will accumulate the progress and number of charges... 
When you have enough charges, double-click the style you want to change to on the style tray to complete the change... 
The maximum number of charges that can be accumulated is 12...
LK_Combat_Change_Trick_Tips2: Double click "style" to change the move
LK_Combat_Changing_Trick_Tips: Rotate the dial to change the next attack's style
LK_Combat_Changing_Trick_Confirm_Tips: Style change is successful, click anywhere to confirm
LK_NeiliDesc_0:
Infuse internal force and gather true qi. 
Makes all weapons and martial arts penetrate enemy's Internal Defense and External Defense more effectively.
LK_NeiliDesc_1:
Infuse internal force and gather true qi.
Makes walking more athletic and swift.
LK_NeiliDesc_2:
Infuse internal force and gather true qi. 
Increase your External Defense and Internal Defense to mitigate the external and internal injuries received.
LK_NeiliDesc_3:
Infuse internal energy and gather true qi. 
Enhances the operation of the internal breath to improve the internal breath capacity.

UI_LegacyActivate_Content:
Taiwu returns, the demon rises again....
FuYu Hilt emits a faint white light, seems to turn awake....
After that, whenever the Taiwu heir is near death, he must pass the FuYu Hilt to others.
To make others inherit all of Taiwu's relics, memories, and Martial Arts, inherit Taiwu's name....
Inherit the mission of Taiwu successor to cut down demons and eliminate devils....

Precisely, full of unshakable brightness of will, when the fire is passed on endlessly....

LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_0: <color=#BehaviorType_Just>For you as a Just</color> warrior there's only black or white, right or wrong. The evil must be punished, and morality shall be encouraged, for there's only one way of being human!
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_1:
You are compassionate, <color=#BehaviorType_Kind>Kind</color>, and behaves noble. 
Dedicating yourself to others, and repaying grievances with virtue. Your sense of morality is precious as gold and jade.
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_2:
You are moderate, unbiased, and <color=#BehaviorType_Just>Even</color>. 
Everything goes with the flow, but prefers balance and harmony. You may finally tolerate everything in the world, for there is a lack of distinction between righteousness and evil in your heart.
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_3:
You are <color=#BehaviorType_Rebel>rebellious</color>, straightforward, intolerant, and distort facts. 
Having opposite views and practices with most people.
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_4:
You are <color=#BehaviorType_Egotistic>Egoistic</color>. Bullying the weakers, crusading the different ones, colluding with the villains, and deceiving kind people. 
Mercenary is ruthless, for profit is the only thing that matters.

UI_EventEditor_Tip_ItemInsertString_Cont:
1. Use <> to include the entire placeholder tag information 
2. All the placeholder tag signatures for items are Item
3. The key field indicates that the item information is obtained from the parameter box
4. The presence of the key field invalidates the id field and the type field
5. The type field and the id field must always appear in pairs
6. The str field indicates that the placeholder is replaced with a string 7
The optional values of str field are Name and ColorName
8. The sp field means that the placeholder is replaced by item icon
9. The value of sp field is always Icon

LK_EventEditor_Publish_Steps:
Congratulations, the current Mod event library is ready! You can follow this process to publish your Mod: 
1. In the automatically opened Config.lua file, fill in the name of your Mod to the value of the Title field and fill in the description of your Mod to the value of the Description field. (If you see the FileId field in the file, don't change the value of this field!)  
2、Ctrl+S to save Config.lua. 
3、Make your own Mod cover, copy the Mod cover mapping to the automatically opened Publish, and rename it to Cover.png. 
4、Return to the main interface, click Module Select->Upload, enter the path of the automatically opened Publish folder just now at the path of the Module folder to be uploaded. path. 
5、Select the module visibility, fill in the update brief, click OK to upload

Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenSucceed_: "Since this matter is my fault in the first place, it should be borne by me alone ......"
"So be it ...... just hope not to implicate others ......"
"In that case, it's time to put an end to this matter ......"
"So that's good? You are rather 'contented and happy' ......"
"I will not dare to forget today's humiliation!"
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_J: "I have a clear conscience, how can I be held hostage by you ......"
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_K: "I can't afford to make one mistake after another, so I'm sorry. ......"
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_E: "This request is not in line with reason, forgive me for not being able to agree ......"
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_R: "Trying to get me to say yes based on this matter alone is a fool's errand ......"
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_E: "Hmph, seeking skin with a tiger, not measuring yourself ......"
Event_SecretInformation_Admonish_CombatW: "I have always been a promise, since you have beaten me squarely, I will listen to you!"
"This time I am happy and sincere, so I will do what you want ......"
"The things of the world are here and there, this time you have won, I should listen to what you say ......"
"Today is just a momentary oversight on my part, not a lack of skill, forced to listen to ......"
"I can beat me to see that you have some skills, so I will listen to you once!"
Event_SecretInformation_Admonish_CombatL: "Willing to bet to lose, since you can't beat me, there is no need to bother with words!"
"I am grateful for the ...... faith in words and actions, and I am sorry that I cannot listen to this matter ......"
"Heaven and earth, you have lost, I can't do what you say since ......"
"Hee hee, why don't you take your defeat to advise me again and see if I can listen?"
"Humph, defeated underling, when you have the ability to beat me, then it's not too late to teach me a lesson!"
Event_SecretInformation_Admonish_LifeSki: "You have a chapter in this outburst, a micro-word, I admire a million, I should listen to it!"
"The words of the sages, every word, my heart is pleased with them ......"
"Poor God knows the transformation, the warp and woof of heaven and earth, this natural way, is really the best ......"
"Where do you read this high-sounding talk from, it sounds harmonious!"
"Your words today will be of some help to my plan!"
"I have my own reasons for acting this way; if you can't convince me, then don't stop me!"
"Although you are wonderful words, yet reason is not better than words, how can I be convinced of it ......"
"The things in the world, there are many different opinions, there is not this much right and wrong ......"
"Distorting the truth and reversing black and white are clearly my skills, why did you steal them?"
"How can there be so much truth in the world! What I do and what I say is the truth!"

"Bitter words are good for the sick, and words of advice are good for the sick. ......"
"Rambling so much, it is headache ...... I listen to you is!"
"You have always been obedient to me, today since you came to beg me, I will listen to you once!"
"I have always shown no favoritism, so why waste your breath!"
"Although you have a good intention, I am sorry I cannot accept ......"
"You and I are not yet as high love and far-reaching, I can hardly obey ......"
"If you cry on a cry, I may still be able to believe that you have a few sincere words ......"
